name: Maze of Moros
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding journey through the treacherous Maze of Moros, where the mad King's labyrinth guards the legendary Violet Scale. Navigate procedurally generated levels, each presenting a unique challenge, and encounter a myriad of monsters. Utilize a variety of powerful spells strategically to survive and claim the coveted artifact. With a fast-paced and engaging gameplay experience, the Maze of Moros promises endless excitement. Plus, stay tuned for future updates featuring even more spells to master. Download now and prove your mettle in this action-packed roguelike adventure.
